item.description: Movie Theatres located at The Shoppes of Blackstone Valley, Millbury, MA. Nominated for 10 Oscars. The story of the life of an impoverished Indian teen Jamal Malik, who becomes a contestant on the Hindi version of "Who Wants to be A Millionaire?", wins, and is then suspected of cheating. Movie starts at 12:50 pm, try to get there at 12:30 pm to buy your tickets so we can get seats. One of the best films of the year! Run time 120 minutes. Filming location was Mumbai, India. Great Reviews! We can go to one of the restaurants afterwards if you'd like (ex: Applebee's, TGIF, etc). See you then!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the lobby in front of the ticket counter (wearing a long black coat)
item.name: Movie - Slumdog Millionaire
